events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully; your software engineering skills and experience match our requirements.
You responded promptly to our interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm for the next steps in the software engineer hiring process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the software developer position on May 10th at 10 AM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding ability and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled on May 15th to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
The HR interview was completed successfully; your values and expectations align well with our company culture.
We are pleased to extend an offer for the Software Engineer role, including details about salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked a few questions about onboarding and start dates.
You formally accepted the offer for the engineering position, confirming your start date and excitement for joining the team.
Your onboarding process has begun with the welcome session and system access setup to prepare you for your first day.
The hiring process is now closed successfully. We are excited to have you join our engineering team.
